channel.title: Evil IRC Client
channel.description:
Ya, I've been working on a client the past day and half or so, and this is what I've gotten (Not releasing the source right now, because it's really ugly lmao)
At first, I was just playing around then it turned into a serious project, so I'm going to recode it and then I may release it.
Legend: Completed Not Completed
Things I'm planning to add in the recode:
[ul][li]Nick list[/li] [li]Link support[/li] [li]Scripting support[/li] [li]Multiple channel support[/li] [li]Server/Channel list[/li] [li]Colors[/li] [li]JMenuBar[/li] [li]Fully customizable[/li] [li]Addon support[/li] [li]Un-hardcode some stuff[/li] [li]Timestamps[/li][/ul]
Any suggestions you may have, please, feel free to suggest them in this topic :)
Screenshots of my progress can be found here: http://tehcowie.net/client/images
And since yakman was nagging (:P) Here's the source to my old client (The ugly one)
http://tehcowie.net/client/src/MainClass.java http://tehcowie.net/client/src/IRCClass.java
(I warned you.)

plz no hurt 0freese

item.title: Evil IRC Client
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:5, topic:185463”][quote author=Evil_ link=topic=247745.msg2082086#msg2082086 date=1204421370]

im assuming addon support will be for things like plugins?
ill have a think
[/quote]Yeah, that’ll be it, the main thing I need to figure out for that is how to reload them without reloading the whole app

try something like the following

void reload() { scripts.clear(); System.gc(); for (String directory : directorys) { File scriptDir = new File(directory); ClassAggregator ca = new ClassAggregator(scriptDir, Script.class, true); for (Class c : ca) addClass(c); } }[/quote]Oh wow, that’s all?

Makes sense when I think about it lol

Read full topic

item.title: Evil IRC Client
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

[quote=“Evil_, post:4, topic:185463”][quote author=Ollie link=topic=247745.msg2082081#msg2082081 date=1204421319]
im assuming addon support will be for things like plugins?
ill have a think
[/quote]Yeah, that’ll be it, the main thing I need to figure out for that is how to reload them without reloading the whole app[/quote]
try something like the following

void reload() { scripts.clear(); System.gc(); for (String directory : directorys) { File scriptDir = new File(directory); ClassAggregator ca = new ClassAggregator(scriptDir, Script.class, true); for (Class c : ca) addClass(c); } }

edit: infact, just look at cherokee (mopar will be pleased)

Read full topic
